SelectAction:
You can:
Scenarios         --> Type 1
Change language          --> Type 2
Quit                     --> Type 3
ScenarioMenuOptions:
Select a scenario to execute  --> Type 1
Add a scenario to the list   --> Type 2
Modify an existing scenario  --> Type 3
Delete an existing scenario  --> Type 4
Quit                        --> Type 5
